title: Why was this removed? Biased much?
body:
Why was this removed but THIS:  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/mHsVGvXZ-the-girl-on-the-left-is-15-and-the-girl-on-the-right-is-16 gets to stay up? So if the thread is big enough you can say whatever you want? This was simply helpful advice on how to attract a date. I can't wait till Riot support responds to my re-directed ticket. 

There are multiple other threads with the same topic being discussed? I'm a special snowflake?

Edit: LOL Mods finally deleted it. Figures.

http://i.imgur.com/Btb6K2j.png
